review: Love it! But I have to unplug and replug the stick every time I want to use it. No problem but an inconvenience. Otherwise, it's been great
author: Amazon Customer

review: This is a great way to turn your regular tv into a smart tv. This stick is fun and so easy to use. Installation is easy.  I would recommend this to everyone. I love the fact that it comes with the adapter in case the stick doesn't fit in the slot allotted.
author: Marisol Fernandez

review: We had to buy a HDMI splitter to work with our older TV, but it all works perfectly now!  I can't wait to cancel my subscription to cable! YAY!
author: Jamie Dee "Jamie Dee"

review: Super easy to use and set up, even for this non-techy girl!  Love being able to watch my shows on TV now instead of the laptop.  I'm only just starting to play with Prime Music, but so far, really enjoying that, too.  Well worth the money.
author: Elizabeth Wiskerchen

review: I love my Fire TV Stick so much I had to buy another one for my kids tv..Its for sure worth ever penny 👍
author: Danielle M Smith

review: I purchased this device to stream Prime content. I was never able to do this successfully using AppleTV. The device works great. Programming plays instantly with no buffering delays. I do use the power cord that is included. Pleasantly surprised with the Fire Stick.
author: Greg

review: so far so good. connection works seamlessly.  Enjoying the new Bosch series which is excellent as well.  Highly recommend the Fire TV stick.  PBS
author: PBS

review: Good device, it is not as fast as the fire TV but it works as good as it. I installed many applications and all of them where compatible. I would definitely recommend it. The only unexpected thing was that the device used an alternate power source, so you need to have an additional power outlet for that.
author: Pablo Lopez
